title_full: FSIOPS01-BP01 Define roles and responsibilities across risk functions
title: Define roles and responsibilities across risk functions
description: Establish clear roles and responsibilities both within and across the three lines of defense functions to verify the effectiveness and auditability of the cloud operating model.
outcome: Achieve effective risk management through clearly defined and communicated roles across the three lines of defense.

title_full: FSIOPS01-BP02 Engage with your risk management and internal audit functions to implement a process for the approval of cloud risk controls
title: Engage with your risk management and internal audit functions to implement a process for the approval of cloud risk controls
description: Document and demonstrate controls, technology, and processes to secure and operate the cloud environment with regular review cadence for new controls.
outcome: Align cloud usage with governance obligations through documented controls and regular reviews.

title_full: FSIOPS01-BP03 Implement a process for adopting appropriate risk appetites
title: Implement a process for adopting appropriate risk appetites
description: Evaluate criticality of business processes and specify required availability levels, working backwards from risk appetites to drive operational priorities and resiliency design choices.
outcome: Drive effective risk management and governance through clearly defined risk appetites for workloads.

title_full: FSIOPS02-BP01 Understand the Shared Responsibility Model and how it applies to services and workloads you run in the cloud
title: Understand the Shared Responsibility Model and how it applies to services and workloads you run in the cloud
description: Review the AWS Shared Responsibility Model and map AWS and customer responsibilities according to each service used and your control environment.
outcome: Understand control responsibilities between AWS and the customer for effective risk management.

title_full: FSIOPS02-BP02 Develop an enterprise cloud risk plan
title: Develop an enterprise cloud risk plan
description: Map interactions between business consumers and internal stakeholders, integrate across three lines of defense, and carry out risk-based assessment of operating model.
outcome: Achieve comprehensive cloud risk management through integrated risk planning across the organization.

title_full: FSIOPS03-BP01 Implement a process for the review of applicable compliance and regulatory requirements for your workload
title: Implement a process for the review of applicable compliance and regulatory requirements for your workload
description: Review migration plan and control frameworks with compliance stakeholders to identify regulatory requirements. Use AWS Compliance Center and AWS Config Conformance Packs.
outcome: Meet compliance obligations through comprehensive review of regulatory requirements.

title_full: FSIOPS04-BP01 Implement a change management process for cloud resources
title: Implement a change management process for cloud resources
description: Implement lightweight approval processes integrated into CI/CD pipelines with automated testing, validation, and detection of bad changes.
outcome: Accelerate deployment cycles while maintaining security controls through automated change management.

title: Implement infrastructure as code
description: Build and tear down entire environments programmatically and automatically using AWS CloudFormation templates or AWS Systems Manager automation.
outcome: Enable rapid recovery and high availability through programmatic infrastructure management.

title: Prevent configuration drift
description: Monitor changes to application infrastructure using CloudFormation drift detection, CloudTrail, and AWS Config to limit errors and reduce MTTR.
outcome: Prevent configuration drift between primary and secondary sites to ensure reliable disaster recovery.

title_full: FSIOPS05-BP01 Use enhanced monitoring in the cloud
title: Use enhanced monitoring in the cloud
description: Define, collect, and analyze metrics emitted by code, workloads, and user activity in a centralized, queryable system for visualizing real-world performance data.
outcome: Understand operational state of workloads through comprehensive monitoring and observability.

title: Monitor cloud provider events
description: Use AWS Health Dashboard and AWS Health API to receive alerts about AWS service events and integrate into centralized monitoring systems.
outcome: Receive timely information about AWS service events to manage and prepare for scheduled activities.

title_full: FSIOPS06-BP01 Manage cloud provider service events
title: Manage cloud provider service events
description: Assess business impact of cloud provider service events, communicate to downstream stakeholders, and conduct post-event operational reviews.
outcome: Effectively manage service events with timely communication to stakeholders and regulatory bodies.

title_full: FSIOPS07-BP01 Test, model, and simulate scenarios before rollout
title: Test, model, and simulate scenarios before rollout
description: Run regular game days to test risk appetite, validate operational procedures, and build team muscle memory for severe but plausible scenarios.
outcome: Validate operational procedures and recovery objectives through regular game day exercises.

title: Conduct post-event operational reviews
description: Conduct post-event operational reviews after incidents to identify root causes and implement corrective actions to prevent recurrence.
outcome: Continuously improve operational processes through systematic review of incidents and implementation of preventative measures.
